messages.title: Maggie's Record of Action in Solihull
messages.content: Even before Maggie Throup was selected as Parliamentary Candidate, she was working hard for the community. Leading high profile campaigns meant Maggie was already well known to many residents as an effective local champion before she became involved in politics.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Committed to doing whatever she can to keep this major employment and manufacturing site open.

Maggie welcomes the Conservative's commitment to cut taxes, the promised pension worth earning free, change bus passes, free TV licenses and winter fuel allowances which also help all Solihull pensioners.

Maggie is offended by the graffiti across Solihull and Shirley, Maggie wants a zero tolerance approach to reduce or eliminate unsightly graffiti. She'll continue to work with the local police to make this happen.

Maggie's persistent campaigns against inappropriate development have been successful. Conservatives pledge to end 'garden grabbing' and ensure residents are involved in shaping and protecting the character of neighbourhoods. Local people will also have a say on where phone masts go.

issues.economy: Committed to doing whatever she can to keep major employment and manufacturing site open.
issues.environment: Maggie's persistent campaigns against inappropriate development have been successful.
issues.health: Maggie will continue her fight to protect Solihull Hospital, especially maternity services, leading to safer maternity services.
issues.socialWelfare: Maggie welcomes the Conservative's commitment to cut taxes, the promised pension worth earning free, change bus passes, free TV licenses and winter fuel allowances which also help all Solihull pensioners.

housing.content: Conservatives pledge to end 'garden grabbing' and ensure residents are involved in shaping and protecting the character of neighbourhoods.

images.caption: Maggie's record of action in Solihull.
Maggie will save our maternity services.
